blog.name: inexchangeforyoursoul
blog.title: A blog full of bunnies, sunshine and ripped heads.
blog.description:
Hello, I'm Kate but most people know me as Inex nowadays. Low-key pervert and rather tolerant 28-y-o aroace virgin; my birthday is 16th Feb if interested. No matter in what way I'm ruining your life, you are fucking welcome. (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧

Expect art, places and waves of my Holy Trinity aka Homestuck, Dark Souls and One Piece. Other regulars are Undertale, HeroAca and clods + some original content /see link below/. I also blog about everything that I find interesting or pretty- may include triggering (like, idk... gore) or angering (politics, mlp, you name it) stuff; otherwise this blog is pretty sfw and if you'd rather I tagged something, go ahead and ask and I'll do my best to remember! (´˙v˙`) NOTE: I've had enough of bots, so if you have a sfw blog follow me with that one because I WILL INSTABAN ANYONE WITH MORE THAN ONE IMAGE/PAGE OF THE NASTIES.

tags: also let him be punk rock
summary: Today's hot take: claw-like nails and progressively more bird-like fingertips and toes. (Also, you know how you hair can do the...
body:
Today’s hot take: claw-like nails and progressively more bird-like fingertips and toes.

(Also, you know how you hair can do the thing where it splits? An especially severe case, this one. Makes the would-be strong strands the fluffiest feathery shit. Catastrophic after a wash.)

(OH, AND!! dis biptch still has baby fat on his face y/y)

blog.name: shoutoquirk
blog.title: ask box open!
blog.description:
please send in requests!

RULES

summary: Hey I’m not sure if this is considered an emergency request or not but could you do some comfort headcanons for Todoroki, Iida,...
question: Hey I’m not sure if this is considered an emergency request or not but could you do some comfort headcanons for Todoroki, Iida, and Momo with a s/o who doesn’t want to get out of bed and they (todo, Iida, and Momo) find out its because its the anniversary of their s/o’s family member’s death? Sorry this is so self-indulgent. Today is just really difficult. If this isn’t considered an emergency request then I’m sorry to waste your time
answer:
don’t worry about it, love !! i hope youre feeling okay, i’m sorry i responded to this so late. i had a rough night and was completely out of it this morning, but i hope you’re feeling better! <3

todoroki shouto

  • the topic had come up briefly a while ago, and he’s always kept it in mind
  • he wants to be there just as much as you are for him, so naturally, he not only wants to give you enough space, but also wants to distract you from all the negative thoughts floating around in your head
  • just a little bit past midday, he knocked on your door. pausing for a moment, he carefully turned the doorknob, and to his pleasure, it was unlocked
  • “[name]. it’s me, i hope you don’t mind.”
  • you really were just a lump in your bed, which he understood. he was the same way when his mother was sent to the hospital
  • he carefully sat on the edge of your bed, and seeing your head pop up caused his heart to squeeze a little bit in pain. you just seemed so sad, and he wished he could do more to help you out
  • “i brought you some snacks. do you want to sit up and watch something together? we could watch um.. disney, or some studio ghibli movies. you wanted to introduce them to me, right?”
  • you nodded quietly, sniffing a little as he passed the bag to you. he understood that you didn’t exactly want to talk about it immediately, but he wanted to let you know that despite all that, he’d be there for you throughout it all
  • placing in a movie disk into your laptop, he placed it on the bed. you immediately shifted to sit more comfortably next to him as he wrapped his arm around your shoulders.
  • he might not be able to help you out much in the comforting section, but he could always listen to you.

iida tenya

  • unfortunately, he wasn’t really aware of this beforehand
  • he knew that sometimes you’d get sad when you mentioned a certain family member, but he never realized that they were.. well, you know.
  • you and him tended to be slightly early risers, even on weekends. on weekends, you’d like to study with him, and he got concerned when he was the only one there. you weren’t the type to show up late, and he couldn’t help but wait a little longer
  • but half an hour into the supposed study date, he decided to go to your dorm instead of just waiting around. you weren’t responding to his texts either, and just… what if something happened to you!
  • he knocked on your door, only for no response
  • he felt guilty about opening the door without your permission, but he did so anyways. his concern for you was higher than his morals
  • “[name?] it’s tenya, i’m worried.”
  • he only heard a small mumble in response. heading towards your bed, you peeked your head out to meet his concerned gaze.
  • “are you still tired?” he asked
  • when you shook your head no, he sat down.
  • “whats wrong?”
  • you spilt about what happened, causing his chest to clench in pain for you
  • he wanted to relieve you from the pain, but he wasn’t able to do that
  • he was lucky for his brother to still be alive at least, but it wasn’t the same for you
  • the two of you just sat as he listened to you, occasionally soothing you and bringing you glasses of water for you to drink and rehydrate yourself
  • he loves you a lot, really. 

yaoyorozu momo

  • much like iida, she didn’t know beforehand either. 
  • to her knowledge, you were very much happy, despite you being a little down the night before. she couldn’t tell why, but she just assumed that it was due to social exhaustion
  • when you didn’t show up to school the next day, that’s when she got extremely worried. she’d been texting you throughout the school day, and to her advail, you barely responded, and when you did, it was bland and seemed a bit… emotionless.
  • right after school, she ran to the dorms. she wanted to comfort you, wanted to know what was wrong. it wasn’t like you to miss school
  • she knocked on your door and waited for a bit. 
  • her eyebrows rose when you opened the door with a large blanket wrapped around you, but once she saw your teary face, she was immediately even more concerned
  • “[name], what happened? are you alright? do you want to talk about it?”
  • she couldn’t help but get nervous. who did she have to talk to? who caused you to be so upset? could she even do anything to help?
  • you mumbled some response before opening the door wider for her to enter before closing it and locking it
  • “my family member, um…” you sniffed, but somehow you managed to talk to her despite having to take breaks to cry a little
  • she hugged you tight through all of it, even if your tears soaked through her clothing occasionally
  • she made you some comfort items, like a fluffy blanket and a heating pad and some other stuff to just let you know that she was here for you
  • at the end of the day, she stayed in your dorm to just sleep and cuddle next to you until you were asleep

reblog.comment:
don’t worry about it, love !! i hope youre feeling okay, i’m sorry i responded to this so late. i had a rough night and was completely out of it this morning, but i hope you’re feeling better! <3

blog.name: ao3feed-shouji
blog.title: Shouji Mezou
blog.description: An automatic feed of fics for Shouji Mezou from My Hero Academia posted on Archive of Our Own. If there's an issue or if you have any questions, let me know! (For those on mobile, search "tags" to see the taglist!)

title: KING
description:
by FlitzerJ

The first sight she saw as soon as she cracked open her vision was the sky–a bright and bleeding red smudged with buttery yellow and soft pink.

The second thing she noticed were the round eyes peering down at her behind tangles of burnt orange hair.

“What are you doing lying by the dumpster?”

Words: 2415, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Original Female Character(s), Todoroki Shouto, Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Original Male Character(s), Original Child Character(s), Uraraka Ochako, Iida Tenya, Tokoyami Fumikage, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Yaoyorozu Momo, Kirishima Eijirou, Kaminari Denki, Asui Tsuyu, Ashido Mina, Aoyama Yuuga, Jirou Kyouka, Hagakure Tooru, Mineta Minoru, Ojiro Mashirao, Satou Rikidou, Shouji Mezou, Sero Hanta
  • Relationships: Todoroki Shouto/oc, Todoroki Shouto/Original Character
  • Additional Tags: mentions/implications of rape, Human Trafficking, child trafficking, Angst, Semi AU

blog.name: faketextsfromlastmight
blog.title: Fake texts from last Might
blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary:
Kaminari Denki : Guys! The girls from Class 1-A made a list of the hottest guys in school!
Tenya Iida : That's awful, we're...
body:
Kaminari Denki : Guys! The girls from Class 1-A made a list of the hottest guys in school!
Tenya Iida : That's awful, we're teenagers! Society's already sexualizing us at an alarming degree, do we really need to do it amongst ours/
Kaminari Denki : You're in the Top 5.
Tenya Iida : Oh. With or without my glasses?

summary:
Dabi: What is that stench?
Spinner: Mahogany.
Dabi: In what way?
Spinner: I bought ‘man candles’. They’re candles, but for...
body:
Dabi: What is that stench?

Spinner: Mahogany.

Dabi: In what way?

Spinner: I bought ‘man candles’. They’re candles, but for men.

Dabi: You don’t say.

Spinner: If you don’t like Mahogany, I have others. I’ve got Gunpowder, Barbecue, Sawdust…

Spinner: Here, try ‘Dad’s Belt’.

Dabi, tearing up: Ooh. That takes me back…

blog.name: isminetadeadyet
blog.title: Is Mineta Dead Yet?
blog.description: Has the godforsaken grape been smashed yet? Find out here as we count down the days until we celebrate with the finest of wine for the sweetest of victories.

summary: if i was to kill mineta i’d hire a beautiful woman to lure him into a dark room but then i’d be there.   i’d step on his stomach...
question: if i was to kill mineta i’d hire a beautiful woman to lure him into a dark room but then i’d be there.   i’d step on his stomach and use his hands to pull his balls off one by one until he’s bleeding really badly.   Then i’d pick him up and smack him against a wall really hard repeatedly.   Then i’d beat his face in with a hot iron.   Then i’d get a knife and stab and stab and stab.   If he’s not dead by this point i’d jump on his head and crush his skull. (1/2)
answer:
while doing all of this the beautiful woman will be behind watching so the only thing he wanted in his pathetic life will be so close yet so far and he’d be denied of it. she’d probably pour boiling hot water on his body at some point as well :3 (2/2)

this sounds like a crime in a long string of crimes where the police are after a serial killer that’s targeting perverted character tropes, and the police officer has to morally wrestle with themself about whether to uphold the law and arrest the killer, or allow the killer to keep going for the safety of all women.

and im here for this.

blog.name: shoutoquirk
blog.title: ask box open!
blog.description:
please send in requests!

RULES

summary: can i get an emergency comfort request ?  im having a v rough night and just need some comfort ;-;
question: can i get an emergency comfort request ?  im having a v rough night and just need some comfort ;-;
answer:
sorry about how long this took me to answer!! even so, i hope you’re feeling lots better now, and even if you’re not, i hope this helps brighten your day just a tad :) since you didn’t specify what character you wanted, i hope you’re okay with izuku!

You and Izuku had been dating for three months, and there was nothing but love and trust in the relationship. It was rather awkward at first, with both of you unsure on how much physical affection the other would be comfortable with, but slowly, the two of you figured out the chemistry and how to act around each other. Quick peck on the cheeks turned into soft kissing, and hugs turned into cuddles. The two of you were deemed the cutest couple in Yuuei in no time.

Even so, both of you had problems that you dealt with on your own. You both offered to be there for the other no matter what, and Izuku often reminded you that he was just a text away no matter what. 

Even through your teary eyes, you reached for your phone on your bedside table and curled back up into your ball. You weren’t ready to leave your room and face anyone who could be possibly be wandering around in the hallways. You weren’t at your best at the moment, and anyone who had eyes could see that. Your hair was a tangled mess, your eyes puffy and red from crying. The pillow you were holding could only handle so much.

izu, come over? miss u.

With that quick text, you placed your phone down and waited for your boyfriend to arrive. You didn’t specify anything, but you couldn’t but feel like Izuku knew. He was always so perceptive and he picked up on your typing habits rather easily, and while you weren’t as good as he was, you still happened to be able to comfort him.

Hearing steps down the hallway and a knock on the door, you barely made out a “Come in!” to your boyfriend before he stepped in. Seeing the lump on your bed, he just smiled at you before moving the covers to crawl in with you. He rubbed your back in comfort before wrapping his arms around you. You curled up against him as he ran his hand through your hair.

“You don’t have to talk right now if you don’t want to. But I’m here for you, [name].” Izuku said softly, causing a small smile to appear on your face. You nodded and just laid in bed comfortably with Izuku. Izuku really is your hero.
